title: Manuel Matuzović
description: Manuel is a developer, consultant, speaker and friend from Vienna who specializes in HTML, CSS and accessibility.

title: Charlie Owen
description: Charlie is a front-end developer and speaker based in Berlin. She is best known for her work with Springer Nature and offending tech-bros on twitter.

title: Matthias Ott
description: Matthias is an UI designer and engineer based in Stuttgart. He teaches prototyping and writes passionately about design and the IndieWeb.

title: Ethan Marcotte
description: Ethan wrote the book on responsive web design, but he's also an avid blogger

title: Tobias Ahlin
description: Tobias is a designer, developer and teacher from Stockholm. He's worked for Spotify, Github, Minecraft and Hyper Island.

title: Sarah Drasner
description: Sarah needs no introduction. She's an expert on SVG, core team member of Vue, award winning speaker and staff writer on CSS-Tricks.

title: Oliver Schöndorfer
description: Oliver loves good typography. He runs a two-person design studio in Vienna and is a talented writer and speaker.

title: Lisi Linhart
description: Lisi is a creative developer from Salzburg. She's an expert in the field of web animation and a lecturer for multimedia technology.

title: Cathy Dutton
description: Cathy is a human centered designer from Cheshire. She designs and builds inclusive services focusing on usability, accessibility and information architecture.
